title: UNHCR Tanzania
subtitle: Poor lighting in strategic locations is one on the many causes of high SGBV in refugee camps. UNHCR provides strategic vision for #SGBV prevention &response. title: Catherine Stubberfield
subtitle:
In Iran, inclusive #education nurtures Afghans + locals alike. Since 1979, more than 3 million have sought safety + asylum, including almost a million registered #refugees. 

Allowing these children to attend public schools is life-changing. 

More: https://bit.ly/2qH27QG pic.twitter.com/VtBSZC15Vf

title: Jesuit Refugee Service (JRS)/USA
subtitle: 11th Day of #Advent: Many #refugees that are resettled in the U.S do not arrive prepared for a colder climate. Consider connecting with a local agency to donate a winter coat that will supply families in need of winter clothing #AdventCalendarpic.twitter.com/yjcfjirj47
